services.name: Matrix
services.short_description: Matrix is an open network for secure, decentralized communication.
services.long_description: Private.coffee runs a Matrix server. You can use it to chat with other people at Private.coffee or around the world. Use it with a client of your choice, or use our Element web client.

services.name: CryptPad
services.short_description: Private, encrypted, real-time collaborative editor.
services.long_description: CryptPad is a private, encrypted, zero-knowledge, realtime collaborative editor, similar to Google Docs and Office 365.

services.name: Piped / Invidious
services.short_description: Watch YouTube videos without Google tracking.
services.long_description: Piped and Invidious are alternative front-ends to YouTube. They allow you to watch YouTube videos without Google tracking you.

services.name: MyIP.Coffee
services.short_description: Check your IP address.
services.long_description: MyIP.Coffee allows you to check your current IPv4 and IPv6 addresses.

services.name: Mastodon
services.short_description: Mastodon is a decentralized social network.
services.long_description: Mastodon is a decentralized social network. You can use it to post short messages, follow other people, and more.

services.name: Forgejo
services.short_description: Forgejo is our in-house Git forge.
services.long_description: Forgejo is our in-house Git forge. You can use it to host your Git repositories, and to collaborate with others.

services.name: BigBlueButton
services.short_description: BigBlueButton is an open-source video conferencing system.
services.long_description: BigBlueButton is an open-source video conferencing system. You can use it to hold video conferences, webinars, and more.

services.name: HedgeDoc
services.short_description: HedgeDoc is an open-source collaborative markdown editor.
services.long_description: HedgeDoc is an open-source collaborative markdown editor. You can use it to write and edit documents in markdown, and to collaborate with others.

services.name: GotHub
services.short_description: Alternative GitHub interface that respects privacy.
services.long_description: Gothub is an alternative GitHub interface that respects your privacy. It is currently in alpha, but you can browse and download repositories, and you can also clone them using git+https (although the text on the main page would disagree).

services.name: redlib
services.short_description: redlib is a privacy-friendly alternative front-end to Reddit.
services.long_description: redlib is a privacy-friendly alternative front-end to Reddit. It allows you to browse Reddit without being tracked.

services.name: AllTube
services.short_description: Download videos from YouTube, Vimeo, and more.
services.long_description: AllTube is a video downloader powered by yt-dlp. It allows you to download videos from YouTube, Vimeo, and many other sites. You can also stream the download through our server for extra privacy.

services.name: Structables
services.short_description: Browse Instructables without being tracked.
services.long_description: Structables allows you to browse Instructables without being tracked.

services.name: LibreTranslate
services.short_description: LibreTranslate is a self-hosted translation service powered by Argos Translate.
services.long_description: LibreTranslate is a self-hosted translation service powered by Argos Translate. It allows you to translate text between many languages.

services.name: wishthis
services.short_description: wishthis is a service for creating wishlists.
services.long_description: wishthis is a service for creating wishlists. You can use it to create wishlists for yourself, or to share them with others.

services.name: NocoDB
services.short_description: NocoDB is a self-hosted alternative to Airtable.
services.long_description: NocoDB is a self-hosted alternative to Airtable. It allows you to create databases and tables, and to view and edit them in a spreadsheet-like interface. (Note: If you are unable to create tables upon registration, simply wait a minute or two, log out and then log in again. Note that your email address will be visible to all registered users!)

services.name: Penpot
services.short_description: Penpot is an open-source design and prototyping platform.
services.long_description: Penpot is an open-source design and prototyping platform. It allows you to create designs and prototypes, and to collaborate with others.

services.name: YOURLS
services.short_description: URL shortener for creating handy links.
services.long_description: Use our URL shortener at pcof.fi to turn long, complicated URLs into something more handy.

services.name: Rallly
services.short_description: Rallly is a free collaborative scheduling service for voting and polls.
services.long_description: Rallly is a free collaborative scheduling service. It allows you to create polls and vote on them, similar to Doodle. Pro features are enabled for free after signing in.

services.name: LibreY
services.short_description: Privacy-friendly metasearch engine.
services.long_description: LibreY is an open-source, privacy-friendly metasearch engine. It allows you to search for web, image, video, torrents, and more, and it can also search onion sites.

services.name: Overleaf
services.short_description: Overleaf is an online LaTeX editor for writing and sharing documents.
services.long_description: Overleaf is an online LaTeX editor for writing and sharing documents. It allows you to write documents in LaTeX, and to collaborate with others.

services.name: Binternet
services.short_description: Binternet is a privacy-friendly alternative front-end to Pinterest.
services.long_description: Binternet is a privacy-friendly alternative front-end to Pinterest. It allows you to browse Pinterest without being tracked.
